newsitem.title: UK: John Lewis UK store sales up 3.6% in week.
newsitem.headline: John Lewis UK store sales up 3.6% in week.

text.p: The John Lewis Partnership said its UK weekly department store sales rose 3.6 percent in the week to May 31 from the same week a year earlier. In the 18 weeks to May 31, they were up 9.1 percent.
Total sales, including the Waitrose supermarket group, rose 6.3 percent in the latest week and 7.0 percent in the 18-week period.
The company said it expected department store sales for the first half-year to show a rise of 6.4 percent on a year earlier.
